extendedInfo.description: Find fun day trips on the go with the new Dayzipping for Android. We've taken our most popular features from the website and rebuilt them specifically for the mobile users on the go. A few things you'll love about Dayzipping:- Search our growing collection of over 1,500 user-provided day trips.- Filter trips by category, including adventure, outdoors, and family friendly.- Use Facebook and Twitter APIs to share a trip completion.- Trips connect to turn by turn navigation to guide you to different waypoints.- All trips are provided by users just like you who've actually been on the trip, so you get great objective content!- Read trip reviews for additional tips and tricks in certain areas.- Become a part of the fastest growing day trip site in the world!Thank you for being part of such an exciting movement and please spread the word to your fellow adventurers.

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Very easy to use and I can find all kinds of fun things to do. My wife and I really enjoy finding day trips for that those weekends when we finally are both free! No more sitting around the house wondering what to do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great! Fun and easy to use app!
reviews.comment: I love day trips, and this app is perfect for me. Anywhere I go, I can find fun things to do within my budget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not good, entered a zip code search & came up with a city 43 miles away. Using HTC Inspire 4G. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on Galaxy Nexus running Ice Cream Sandwich. Hasn\'t been updated in a year. Avoid on newer phones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app always tells me it can\'t connect to the server
